sources.title: Badsville | Full Movie | Action Gang Drama | Emilio Rivera
sources.description:
Badsville - A gang is torn when their leader promises his dying mother to leave Badsville, a town where no one makes it out alive.
2017.  Stars: Ian McLaren, Benjamin Barrett, Tamara Duarte, Emilio Rivera

metadata.Plot: A violent greaser gang is ripped apart when their leader finds love and is determined to leave Badsville - a town where love doesn't exist.
metadata.Actors: Ian McLaren, Benjamin Barrett, Tamara Duarte
